@@ -31,4 +31,4 @@ - * This class represents a Network Interface address. In short it's an - * IP address, a subnet mask and a broadcast address when the address is - * an IPv4 one. An IP address and a network prefix length in the case - * of IPv6 address. + * This class represents a Network Interface address. In the case of + * IPv4, this comprises the IP address, a subnet mask, and a broadcast + * address if the interface supports broadcast. In the case of IPv6, + * it comprises the IP address and a network prefix length. @@ -65,0 +65,3 @@ + *

+ * Certain network interfaces, such as the loopback interface, do not support + * broadcasting and will also return {@code null}.
